data.eml:eml: The discovery, naming and typification of Limonium gmelini (Plumbaginaceae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Maryam Malekmohammadi, H. Walter Lack, Maria Lomonosova 3, Hossein Akhani (2017): The discovery, naming and typification of Limonium gmelini (Plumbaginaceae). Willdenowia Annals of the Botanic Garden and Botanical Museum Berlin-Dahlem 47 (2): 99-106, DOI: 10.3372/wi.47.47201
